snakesandladders

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • javafx.scene.control.Labeled
              • javafx.scene.control.Label
                • snakesandladders.Square
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class Square
extends javafx.scene.control.Label
    Objects of this class represent the squares in the grid of the board. These objects are initialized by the Board class, which assigns them their SqNumber and grid coordinates. It inherits from Label in order to be rendered on the screen as a Node.
    Author:
    Shantanu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Square DestSquare
      Points to the Square object the Player will reach if it moves to this current square.
      private java.lang.Integer GridX
      Row number of the Square object, as to be added in the Grid layout control.
      private java.lang.Integer GridY
      Column number of the Square object, as to be added in the Grid layout control.
      private java.lang.Boolean isDestSquare
      Set to true if this Square object is the DestSquare of some other Square object on the board.
      private java.lang.Integer SqNumber
      Number assigned to the square, which is also the text of the Label.

    • Field Detail

      • SqNumber

        private java.lang.Integer SqNumber
        Number assigned to the square, which is also the text of the Label.

      • GridX

        private java.lang.Integer GridX
        Row number of the Square object, as to be added in the Grid layout control.

      • GridY

        private java.lang.Integer GridY
        Column number of the Square object, as to be added in the Grid layout control.

      • DestSquare

        private Square DestSquare
        Points to the Square object the Player will reach if it moves to this current square. This is used to simulate Snakes and Ladders.

      • isDestSquare

        private java.lang.Boolean isDestSquare
        Set to true if this Square object is the DestSquare of some other Square object on the board.
